class.name: AudioEffectPanner
class.brief_description: Adds a panner audio effect to an audio bus. Pans the sound left or right.
class.description: Determines how much of the audio signal is sent to the left and right channels. This helps with audio spatialization, giving sounds distinct places in a mix. [AudioStreamPlayer2D] and [AudioStreamPlayer3D] handle panning automatically, following where the source of the sound is on the screen.

members.member: Pan position. Negative values pan the sound to the left, positive pan to the right. Value can range from -1 to 1.
